Room.Name: Monument Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Monument Avenue, south of Keslar Mountain.
Room.LongDescription: Monument Avenue barely survived the creation of Keslar Mountain, which was created some centuries ago when the Mages of Keslar decided that a mountain would look nice here. High on top of the mountain is the Palace where many of the mages still reside. There is a spooky path up to the Palace on the other side, off of Kafkan Way.
